channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Israel’s IDF Bans Android Phones—Do You Need To Buy An iPhone?
item.description: IDF says Android is not secure — iPhone now becomes mandatory. Here's what that means for Android users everywhere else.

item.title: Samsung SmartThings Adds Security Cameras To Its Matter Mix
item.description: Matter 1.5 added smart security cameras to the spec and SmartThings will support those devices.

item.title: Is China Saving The Planet? Lessons From 2025’s Cleantech Race

item.title: Keychron Q3 HE 8K Is The Gamer’s Competitive Edge Thanks To Some Innovative Technolgy
item.description: The Keychron Q3 HE 8K sets itself apart thanks to groundbreaking 8K polling rate and Ultra-Fast Lime Magnetic switches that use Tunneling Magnetoresis...

item.title: ‘It’s Scary’—FBI Warns Smartphone Users: Do Not Take These Calls
item.description: Hang up immediately. This is an attack.

item.title: Bottomless
item.description: Some pits are infinitely deep. Problems that, once addressed, always get worse. N +1. For some folks, the acquisition of money or power are like this....

item.title: Our practice
item.description: What do you do regularly? Where do you show up, what do you publish? Who do you ask, and what do you answer to? What gets better because you persist? ...

item.title: The thing about chess
item.description: In a typical tournament, you don’t score any extra points for winning with the fewest number of moves. Quickly isn’t the point.

item.title: Filtering ourselves
item.description: We don’t use the same language or ideas with an in-law that we do with our bar buddies. When the internet was young, people often chose to filter them...

item.title: Better than the cheap alternative
item.description: Frozen pizza changed the game for many pizzerias. If you couldn’t offer something better than what I had in my freezer, what do I need you for? If the...
